entry.name: LEAF_MODE_SELECTIVE_X_Y_ALTITUDE_LEARNING
entry.description: Selective X, Y, Altitude learning mode

entry.name: LEAF_MODE_RC_STABILIZE_HOVER_THRUST_ID
entry.description: RC stabilize hover thrust identification mode

entry.name: LEAF_MODE_LEARNING_FULL_DATA_COLLECTION
entry.description: Learning all loops mode - no real-time tuning

entry.name: LEAF_STATUS_NOT_READY
entry.description: Leaf is not ready to fly yet

entry.name: LEAF_MISSION_STATUS_EXECUTING
entry.description: Leaf mission manager is executing a mission

entry.name: LEAF_MISSION_STATUS_PAUSED
entry.description: Leaf mission manager has paused the mission

entry.name: LEAF_CONTROL_PAUSE
entry.description: Pause the exection of the current mission

entry.name: LEAF_CONTROL_RESUME
entry.description: Resume the exection of the current mission

entry.name: LEAF_CONTROL_CANCEL
entry.description: Cancel the exection of the current mission

entry.name: LEAF_CONTROL_ABORT
entry.description: Abort the exection of the current mission

message.name: LEAF_MODE
message.description: The system mode, as defined by enum LEAF_MODE

message.name: LEAF_SET_MODE
message.description: Set the system mode, as defined by enum LEAF_MODE. There is no target component id as the mode is by definition for the overall aircraft, not only for one component.

message.name: LEAF_STATUS
message.description: The system status, as defined by enum LEAF_STATUS

message.name: LEAF_DO_ARM
message.description: Arms the leaf
message.field: The system needs to be armed

message.name: LEAF_DO_TAKEOFF
message.description: Commands the leaf to takeoff

message.name: LEAF_DO_LAND
message.description: Commands the leaf to land

message.name: LEAF_DO_REGISTER_POS_OFFSET_FROM_EST_POS
message.description: Commands the leaf to go into emergency mode
message.field: The system needs to go into emergency mode

message.name: LEAF_DO_QUEUE_TRAJ_FROM_BUFFER_BY_ID
message.description: Commands the leaf to queue a trajectory from the buffer by id
message.field: The system needs to queue a trajectory
The id of the trajectory to queue

message.name: LEAF_DO_SWITCH_MRFT_ROLL
message.description: Commands the leaf to switch to MRFT roll controller
message.field: The system needs to switch to MRFT roll controller
1 to switch on, 0 to switch back off

message.name: LEAF_DO_SWITCH_MRFT_PITCH
message.description: Commands the leaf to switch to MRFT pitch controller
message.field: The system needs to switch to MRFT pitch controller
1 to switch on, 0 to switch back off

message.name: LEAF_DO_SWITCH_MRFT_ALT
message.description: Commands the leaf to switch to MRFT altitude controller
message.field: The system needs to switch to MRFT altitude controller
1 to switch on, 0 to switch back off

message.name: LEAF_DO_SWITCH_MRFT_X
message.description: Commands the leaf to switch to MRFT x controller
message.field: The system needs to switch to MRFT x controller
1 to switch on, 0 to switch back off

message.name: LEAF_DO_SWITCH_MRFT_Y
message.description: Commands the leaf to switch to MRFT y controller
message.field: The system needs to switch to MRFT y controller
1 to switch on, 0 to switch back off

message.name: LEAF_CONTROL_CMD
message.description: Commands the leaf to execute a control command
message.field: The system needs to execute a control command
The id of the mission to control

message.name: LEAF_SAY_TO_QGC
message.description: Commands the leaf to say something to QGC
message.field: The system needs to say something to QGC

message.name: LEAF_DO_ARM_IDLE
message.description: Commands the leaf to switch to MRFT y controller

message.name: LEAF_CLIENT_TAGNAME
message.description: The client tag name
message.field: The tag name of the client

message.name: LEAF_MRFT_STATUS
message.description: The MRFT status

message.name: LEAF_HEARTBEAT
message.description: The heartbeat message

message.name: LEAF_DO_QUEUE_EXTERNAL_TRAJECTORY
message.description: Commands the leaf to queue the external trajectory primitive.
message.field: The system needs to queue the trajectory

message.name: LEAF_ACK_QUEUE_EXTERNAL_TRAJECTORY_POS
message.description: Acknowledges that the external trajectory primitive is queued.
message.field: The system needs to queue the trajectory

message.name: LEAF_ACK_QUEUE_EXTERNAL_TRAJECTORY_ORI
message.description: Acknowledges that the external trajectory primitive is queued.
message.field: The system needs to queue the trajectory

message.name: LEAF_EXTERNAL_TRAJECTORY_SETPOINT_ENU
message.description: Reports the leaf vehicle position, velocity, and acceleration as specified by the external trajectory.
message.field: X acceleration or force in ENU frame in meter / s^2 or N
Y acceleration or force in ENU frame in meter / s^2 or N
Z acceleration or force in ENU frame in meter / s^2 or N

message.name: LEAF_DO_TERMINATE_EXTERNAL_TRAJECTORY
message.description: Terminates the external trajectory is completed.
message.field: The system needs to queue the trajectory

message.name: LEAF_ACK_TERMINATE_EXTERNAL_TRAJECTORY_POS
message.description: Acknowledges that the external trajectory is completed.
message.field: The system needs to queue the trajectory

message.name: LEAF_ACK_TERMINATE_EXTERNAL_TRAJECTORY_ORI
message.description: Acknowledges that the external trajectory is completed.
message.field: The system needs to queue the trajectory

message.name: LEAF_EXTERNAL_TRAJECTORY_OFFSET_ENU_POS
message.description: Stores the last positional offset value in ENU frame.

message.name: LEAF_EXTERNAL_TRAJECTORY_OFFSET_ENU_ORI
message.description: Stores the last orientational offset value in ENU frame.

message.name: LEAF_DO_MISSION_RUN
message.description: Commands the leaf to run a mission.
message.field: The system needs to run the mission
The id of the mission to run
1 to start immediately, 0 to wait for start command

message.name: LEAF_ACK_MISSION_RUN
message.description: Acknowledges that the mission run command has been received.
message.field: The system that received the mission run command

message.name: LEAF_DONE_MISSION_RUN
message.description: Notifies the leaf that the mission has been completed.
message.field: The system that completed the mission
The id of the completed mission

message.name: LEAF_MISSION_STATUS
message.description: The system status, as defined by enum LEAF_MISSION_STATUS

message.name: LEAF_QGC_CONTROL_CMD
message.description: Commands the leaf to execute a control command
message.field: The system needs to execute a control command
The id of the mission to control

message.name: LEAF_QGC_MISSION_START
message.description: Commands the leaf to start the mission
message.field: The id of the mission to start

message.name: LEAF_QGC_RTL
message.description: Commands the leaf to return to launch
message.field: The system needs to execute a control command

message.name: LEAF_ACK_MISSION_PAUSE
message.description: Acknowledges that the mission pause command has been received.
message.field: The system that received the mission pause command

message.name: LEAF_ACK_MISSION_RESUME
message.description: Acknowledges that the mission resume command has been received.
message.field: The system that received the mission resume command

message.name: LEAF_ACK_MISSION_ABORT
message.description: Acknowledges that the mission abort command has been received.
message.field: The system that received the mission abort command

message.name: LEAF_QGC_ABORT
message.description: Commands the leaf to abort the mission
message.field: The system needs to execute a control command

message.name: LEAF_SETPOINT_OFFSET
message.description: Setpoint offset
